text: You r the only intellectual friend I found on campus. (no offence) I really liked talking to you, listening to your thoughts. You really have a very good perspective. Isi vajah se tum UPSC ki taraf bhi inclined the. 1st year with you was the best. 2nd year mei thoda door door ho gye the, par tab bhi koshish this jitna ho sake, milte rahe. 3rd year mei bhi ham ek doosre ke rooms mei aate jaate the, will really remember it. Movies bhi dekhi hai. 4th year to chodh hi do, lol. Best of luck for future bro.
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text:
Hey Rzoo, you were a good partner for acads. We have shared good memories mainly because we had too many courses in common. We even had 3 HSS common, though we did not know each other in PSY151 and SOC173. I remember studying with you one time in the lounge for ECO301. You helped very much with meaningless and endless assignments of the courses. Other than acads, we went for treat. That is all I can remember, lol.
You are very chill, I mean extremely chill. Never have I ever seen you serious. It is good (but not to be proud of, hehe)
At last, I remember your over the top performance in the bayesian course and how you got the project with Arshad. And I still have your bayesian Assignment that I collected for you. I am gonna throw it anyways. All the best.
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text: Hey bro. You r really the most energetic and charming man I have ever seen. You really have a high level of spirit. We first got to know each other in 2nd year. We then got to in a group for TA202A. It was one heck of a course, lol. I saw you play badminton in the last days. I was very surprised by your energy. You are really very good at games, there is not one. I believe you will achieve a great milestone ahead. The memories will be saved. Best of luck.
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text:
I really don't think ki mujhe kaisa bhi memoir likhne ki jarurat hai. Apni yaado ko mai memoir nhi banaunga. Memoir toh ek kitaab mei band ho jayga, par mujhe umid hai ki hamari dosti us kitab mei band nhi ho sakti.

Isliye, is memoir mei aisa tujhe kuch nhi milega jo tu dhoondna chah raha hai. Ham hamesha connected toh hai hi.

Par haan agar kabhi hamara connection fail ho gya ho toh, toh here is my 5-point plan. Ye hai toh tumhare 19-22 saal ke safar ko dekhte hue. Umid karte hain, aage bhi kaam aayega-  

1) Itna yaad rakhna ki duniya ke har kone tak koi "connection" nhi pahunchta hai. agar tu mountain peak par jaata hai toh vaha mobile signal toh NHI milega kabhi, ofcourse. Toh agar peak par jaana hai toh, apne "network" ke comfort zone se bahar toh nikalna HI padega. Safar AKELE hi karna hoga upar tak.

2) Tum ek khuli kitaab toh ho hi. Koi na bhi padhna chahe toh bhi dikh hi jaata hai. Tumhari is khuli kitab ko tumhare colleagues bahut fayda uthaenge, aur tum fas bhi jaaoge. Reason batane ki jarurat nhi.
Isliye koshish karna ki is kitab ko band rakhna. Band karna matlab, jo bhi tumhare anadar chal rha ho, use bahar mat aane do. You need to practice on acting for that. Infront of the mirror, try to make facial expressions, and postures and judge yourself.
Agar itna karne par bhi nhi ho rhi kitab band, toh koshish karna ki "cover" chadha lo. Cover can be used so that your feelings can be covered under it. You can tell a different story. Don't tell your real feelings to everyone. Remember, to tell outsiders ON A NEED TO KNOW BASIS (google it). Seperate your personal and professional life. Tumhari poori mixed up hai. Colleagues ko personal life mei jyada mat ghusne dena. Kuch kaam nhi aayege, kamzor bana denge.
Aur haan, diary likhne se kuch farq nhi padhta hai, ulta negative effects hi hote hai. Isliye diary likhna band hi karo.

3) Ab chalte hai, ek aur related topic par. Self-introspect vs overthink. Self introspect sab ko karna chahiye, it is necessary but overthink nhi. Jab bhi aisa lage ki jyada soch raha hai, then change your thought process. Focus somewhere else. For example, read any interesting topic, preferably in HINDI. (watching videos and listening music don't help, because you need to use your brain.). If you think you always overthink on a certain topic, then dont introspect. Dont think yourself as you. Think about the whole scenario with respect to a 3rd person in the room. Then judge the situation. Think about bigger goals. Or take others' perspective. Lighten your mood.

4) And, "Lighten your mood" ka mtlb bas ek nhi hota hai. Acha laga dekh ke ki tumne apne hostel ke aakhri dino mei control kara. It proved you can DO if you WANT. You can overcome FOMO easily. You cannot ever justify drinking unless it is a medical condition (that to beer). Kabhi iske lat mei mat doobna.

5) Doobte toh tum "friends" mei bhi ho. lol. Maine tumhe in 4 saalo mei kai baar alag-alag "samudra" doobte dekha hai. Tumhe "samudra" ki "gahraiyon" ko explore karne ka badha shaok hai. Par yaad rkhna, utna hi gahrai mei jaana, jahan se tum bahar aa sako. Kisi mei itna mat doob jaana ki fir uski gahrai tumhe apne andar kheechne lage. Ache ache divers bhi doob jaate hain, jyada gaharaiyon mei. Agar samudra see bahar an aa paao toh "tairna" seekh lo. Swimming mei bhi bahar nikalne ke liye, "samudra" ke "pani" ko peeche dhakelna padhta hai. Samudra ko toh kuch nhi hota, vo vishaal hai. Par tum jaroor baahar aa jaoge, khuli hava mei saans le paaoge. Tum apna socho, sumdra ka nhi. Ghut ke nhi jeena hota hai.

Last mei,
"ZINDAGI NA MILEGI DOBARA" - is phrase ka real meaning dekhna. Zindgai sirf ghoomne firne se nhi banti. Zindagi har pal hai. JEETE TUM HAR PAL HO, MARTE EK BAAR HO.
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text:
Apne 4 saal ke safar ki shuruaat toh SOS ke khaali engine se hui thi. Par jaldi hi us engine mei alag alag dabbe judhte gye. Usme se kuch daabe jo mujhe yaad aate hai- ESO208, SOS coordis, ayush anurag bitching, and finaly UPSC. UPSC ka plan toh tera mujhe 3rd year ke lockdown mei hi pata chala. Agar pahle pata chala hota toh, saath mei kaafi padh liye hote. Khair chodo, umid hai sab apne goals ko achieve kar le.
Aur haan, tumhe kuch jyada hi hasne ki aadat hai :D. Achi baat hai, bas serious bhi ho jaaya karna beech beech mei. Age seriousness aur dedication hi le jaayegi.
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text: O hi, I first saw you in 1st year, session of women cell when you were speaking on something as far as I remember. From then to now, we shared many things. You even did a practice robot thing with our group. You are bold and fearless, maintain it. All the best.
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text:
Bhai. tere baare mei jab bhi yaad aata hai, sabse pahle vo TA ka solidworks yaad aata hai. us samay meri poore 4 saalo mei sabse jyada fati rahti thi, and you r a life saver. Ab tak maine 6 cities ke 8 schools mei padha hoon. Kai dost peeche choot jaate hai. Bachpan mei bahut mushkil hua karta tha. Ab aadat padh chuki hai. Aaj tak mera koi dost mujhe fir nhi mila. Tujhse mai pahli baar neemuch mei mila tha. Mera 6B aur 7A tha. vahan se jaane ke baad socha nahi tha maine fir milna hoga. Par us din tujhe lift mei dekhne par, mera dimag confusiya gya. Ye kya ho gya. Kya ye vahi hai. Yahi soch raha tha.

Uske baad apna safar badhiya hi guzra. Umid hai, tum aage success prapt karoge. Best of luck priy mitr!
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text: Hey bro, vaise toh kuch likhne ki zarurat nhi, sab toh kah hi diya the toast ke vakt. Par fir bhi to save you in my good books. Will remember you. You are the most different person in our wing. Can't forget the 4-year journey. Will stay connected. :)
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text:
Kahne ko toh bahut kuch tha. Par kaha hi nhi, zarurat nhi padhi. Hamare beech mast bond hai, bina jyada bole hi samajh jaate hai ek doosre ki baate, Jay ki khichayi se lekar acads ki baato tak. Bahut doubts solve kiye hai tune, afsos hum eco201 mei return nhi kar paaye, lol. MTH101 se lekar yahan aa gye aaj, time badhi jaldi beet gya. Kuch kaam na hone par ek doosre ke room par aa jaate the, kaafi maza aata tha. :D

Tumhari fitness bhi gazab hai, bahu garmi lagti hai aur trips par tumhare "dost" aa jaate hai. 2 baar back2back covid ho gya. Iske bavjood bhi tumhara sports mei javab nhi. Baminton mei toh nhi jeet paate mujhse, ofcourse :P, but kaafi versatile ho. TT, Baddy, Cricket, aur pata nhi.

Tum bhale hi wing ke last days at hostel mei nhi aa paaye, koi baat nhi, video calling ki tech ne kami nhi hone di. Isi tech ko aur aage lekar jaana, best of luck. :)
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text: Hey Sathvik. bhai hum bhai toh hai hi. par kam bhai hote hai, jo aakhri tak tike rahe, hehe. Kaafi changes aaye hai teri college life mei. Kahan tu 1st year kuch "ulta" nhi bolta tha, sirf padhta rahta tha, aur ab dekho. Kaafi badiya tha. Apni dosti NIBHANA. ok, chal thank you. Ho sake toh meri book lauta dena, The Undercover Economist, lol.
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text: Hey Sathvik. bhai hum bhai toh hai hi. par kam bhai hote hai, jo aakhri tak tike rahe, hehe. Kaafi changes aaye hai teri college life mei. Kahan tu 1st year kuch "ulta" nhi bolta tha, sirf padhta rahta tha, aur ab dekho. Kaafi badiya tha. Apni dosti NIBHANA. ok, chal thank you. Ho sake toh meri book lauta dena, The Undercover Economist, lol.
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text:
I really hope you didn't forget me if you are reading this after a long time. agar yaad na aaye toh apne memoir padhna jo tune mere liye likha tha. Kaafi descriptive hai. :)

Mile ham mutual friend Priyanshu ki vajah se the (PSY151A ke group ke liye), par vaise bhi milna ho hi jaata department se. Par 1st year se hi milne ki vajah se hamara bond kaafi acha ban gya. Apne college mei within-batch acads ke alava jyadatar log baat nhi karte, par hum kaafi kiye.

College mei kam hi log hote hain jo apne subjects ko interest se padhte hain, tum bhi unme se hi the. Is vajah se hamara acads mei kaafi banti thi aur saare groups bhi ek hi saath banaye. Kai baar hum class ke baad cycle par hi sab doubts discuss kar lete the. Is vajah se eco padhne ki jarurat nhi padhi. lol

Par acads ke alava bhi hamare kaafi similar interests the. Tera simple aur decent nature kaafi sahi hai. Aur tujhe hasne ki bahut aadat hai, bhale hi baat faltu ho. Isko change mat hone dena. Sab problems aasan ho jaati hai.

Hamne kaafi extra time saath mei bhi kaata hai jaise, mera room (D6, Hall 12), library, ccd, aur ek din yaad ho toh hum ghumte ghumte akele L20 bhi gye the jab sem khatm ho gya tha. Hum dono ko nature aur silence kaafi acha lagta hai.

In short, you made my life at IITK SIMPLE (simple like a home). Jab bhi mood kharab ho toh tujhse baat karke acha hi lagta tha. Par mujhe tera TV series ka taste acha nhi laga, lol. koi nhi.
Kuch samay pahle tu IES ki taiyaari kar raha tha, abhi pata nhi kya update hai. Plans change hote hai, koi nhi. Par tera jo bhi plan bane, best of luck. Umid karte hai, jab bhi kabhi tu ise fir se padh raha ho, tu kaafi succesful ho gya hoga.
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text: Hello bhai, toast hone ke baad ab kuch likhne ki zarurat toh nhi, par tab bhi to save the memories in this book. You have always been very dedicated to anything you do. Bas ek baat hai. Koshish ke baavjood bhi kuch na milne par confidence mat khoya kar. Result = HardWork (80%) + Luck (20%). You do hard work but luck is not always in favour of everyone. It is the truth. We should keep trying. It is the best. Wish you a happy journey.
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text: Yo bhai Utkarsh. Umid hai jab bhi tu is book ko padh raha ho, ham connected honge. Tumhe bhale hi apne 4yr journey mei wing se saath na mila ho (mainly due unique branch), par jitna ho sake acha vakt guzara hai. Bahut jyada hi chaapu ho, yeh kahne ki zaurat toh hai nhi, after you have been awarded the title 'Sir'. Aise hi chapte rahna, akela mat samajhna. Pata hai hame tum sabse connected rahne ki sabse jyada koshish karte ho wing mei. Bahut achi baat hai. best of luck for future.
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text:
Yo bro.
Bahut sahi fitness discipline hai bhai tera. Achievements toh chalti rahti hai, par mujhe tu hi mila jo genuinely apni health par dhyaan deta hai. bahut achi baat hai. Health ko hamesha priority rakhna. See you :).
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)

text: Bhai itna swag kahan lekar jaaoge :D. Bahut sahi ho, har vakt relaxed
author: Naman Agrawal (M Agrawal)
